participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and adventurous, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: My pets are my best friends and they make me laugh every day. I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends. I work out daily. I got hired as a security guard.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and whimsical, with a love for all things fantastical.
participant_2.background: My cats are my family, and I don't know what I would do without them. My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend. I once saw a moose cross the road while I was riding my bike. I love eating kale. I am allergic to apples yet still eat them.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
It is going well! I just got done practicing my makeup for a cosplay costume that is coming in the mail.
That sounds like fun! I have never cosplayed before.
I love it! It is a great way to express yourself.
What kind of cosplay are you doing?
I am going to be Princess Zelda from the Zelda video game series.
That sounds really cool! I have heard good things about the Zelda games.
They are really fun! I have played them all.
What is your favorite thing about the Zelda games?
I love the exploration and the puzzles.
Those are two of my favorite things too!
We should play Zelda together sometime!
That would be fun! I would love to.
Great! I will send you my friend code.
